mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.ID, P.MEMBER_ID, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_CATEGORY, V.VIDEO_LINK, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(L.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_LIKE L WHERE L.POST_ID = P.ID) AS LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(R.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_REPLY R WHERE R.POST_ID = P.ID) AS REPLY_COUNT, (SELECT F.FILE_NAME FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = P.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = P.ID)) AS FILE_NAME, (SELECT F.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = P.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = P.ID)) AS FILE_PATH FROM TBL_POST P LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTIST_POST A ON P.ID = A.POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_VIDEO_POST V ON P.ID = V.POST_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC, P.POST_VIEW_COUNT DESC, REPLY_COUNT DESC, P.ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.ID, A.MEMBER_ID, A.POST_TITLE, A.POST_CONTENT, A.POST_VIEW_COUNT, A.POST_WRITE_TIME, A.POST_UPDATE_TIME, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(L.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_LIKE L WHERE L.POST_ID = A.ID) AS LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(R.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_REPLY R WHERE R.POST_ID = A.ID) AS REPLY_COUNT, (SELECT F.FILE_NAME FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = A.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = A.ID)) AS FILE_NAME, (SELECT F.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = A.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = A.ID)) AS FILE_PATH FROM VIEW_ARTIST_POST A JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE A.POST_WRITE_TIME >= (SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' MONTH) ORDER BY POST_VIEW_COUNT DESC, LIKE_COUNT DESC, REPLY_COUNT DESC, ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.ID, P.MEMBER_ID, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_SUBTITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_CATEGORY, P.POST_VIEW_COUNT, P.POST_WRITE_TIME, P.POST_UPDATE_TIME, V.VIDEO_LINK, (SELECT COUNT(L.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_LIKE L WHERE L.POST_ID = P.ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_POST P LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTIST_POST A ON P.ID = A.POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_VIDEO_POST V ON P.ID = V.POST_ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT, P.POST_VIEW_COUNT, P.ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
